text:
@SpeakerPelosi And how did you DEMOCRATS respond to the crisis, Pelosi? Answer: By giving $25 MILLION to the KENNEDY CENTER??? When AMERICANS are struggling & losing their jobs??? You Democrats clearly showed where your priorities lie.
https://t.co/fap267crtt
